managementResponses.response: Thanks, Chris, for your nice comments!  We appreciate your feedback!  Jim McGuire, GM

review.title: Nice hotel and nice staff
review.reviewText: Hotel stay was great for my family and I.  The staff was nice and helpful.  The room was very comfortable an relaxing for us

managementResponses.response: Hello and thank you for your comments.  We do not have any smoking rooms, I am sorry if someone smoked in the room - it is disrespectful not only to our policy, but to other guests.  We appreciate your feedback.  Jim McGuire, GM

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: Convenient location close to airport. Nice breakfast but food area needs more supervision. A guest blew up a boiled egg in the microwave and although he tried wiping with napkins no one around to help or clean up.
review.negativeRemarks: Room smelled like it had been a smoking room.

managementResponses.response: Thanks so much for your nice comments!  Please come back and stay with us again!  Jim McGuire, General Manager

review.reviewText:
great location to airport
great room
nice lobby area with lots of amenities
great breakfast included

managementResponses.response: Hello Candy and thank you for your comments - we appreciate your feedback!  Jim McGuire, GM

review.title: super close to the airport, good
review.reviewText:
We were there 2 times in July,  1st time, the room seems okay, but the carpet is quite stuffy.
but the breakfast is good, it is buffet continental breakfast.  2nd time, the room is more clean feeling.
I appreciated a lot that we came early, arrive in the hotel at 9:30 a.m.  I wasn't expected to get a room,
but we are lucky, there was one room available. The lady in the counter is very nice, we 
can check in immediately, that I said thousand thanks to her. if not, we have to wait till 3:00 p.m. 
They are very nice to try to accommodate what we need.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your comments.  Jim McGuire, GM

review.title: convenient to the airport
review.reviewText: stayed at the hotel because it was near the airport

managementResponses.response: Hi Jo and thanks for your nice comments.  Our rooms have either queen beds, double beds or king beds.  Please come back again soon.  Jim McGuire, General Manager

review.title: Nice, clean hotel close to everything.
review.reviewText: friendly, helpful staff, room was better than expected. Beds not queens as expected but were full sized.

managementResponses.response: Hi and thank you for your comments.  We have not had these types of comments before, so I am sorry you didn't enjoy your stay.  Jim McGuire, GM

review.title: Old and noisy
review.reviewText:
Aside from a room not much bigger than a walk in closet, paper thin windows and walls felling like I was sleeping on the highway divider and next to my neighbors TV I guess the hotel is OK. 

The good note, the staff was great, friendly with big smiles. I don' know how they do it.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your comments.  I will share them with the Director of Housekeeping - this is well below our standards.  Hope to see you again, Anonymous.  Jim McGuire, GM

review.reviewText: Hallways were not vacuumed. Elevators are dirty and brass floor level plates were dirty and not polished.

managementResponses.response: Thanks for your comments.  Our shuttle runs every 30 minutes - so sorry if it was late.  Jim McGuire, GM

review.title: Near Airport
review.reviewText: Suttle bus didn't come at the bus stop among 30 min. Hilton & Marriot'bus comes here every 10min.

managementResponses.response:
Hello Zak and thank you for your extended stay - I am happy you enjoyed our hotel.  Jim McGuire,
General Manager

review.title: Good hotel. Room comfort average. Breakfast good.
review.reviewText: Stayed 6 days at this hotel. Close to the airport. Room comfort/amenities are average.  The breakfast was a self-serve buffet and it was fairly good.  The staff were very courteous and helpful.  We stayed in a room with two double beds. We found the beds a bit small and they were quite high off the ground .

managementResponses.response: Hello and thank you very much for your nice feedback!  We appreciate it!  Jim McGuire, GM

review.reviewText: Clean room, comfortable bed, ample breakfast choices. Helpful staff, close to airport with good shuttle. What more could I ask?

managementResponses.response: Thank you for our 5-star rating and your comments!  We appreciate it!  Jim McGuire, GM

review.title: great service to airline passengers
review.reviewText: Found the hotel convenient for transients requiring easy access to the airport.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your nice comments!  Jim McGuire, General Manager

review.reviewText: Comfy beds, good night sleep. Not bad for it being right by the airport

managementResponses.response: Hello Maryanne and thank you for your comments.  I am sorry that the outside noises from disrupted your stay.  We do hope you give us another try.  Jim McGuire, General Manager

review.title: Close to the airport and convenient shuttle
review.reviewText: Average experience. I would not recommend this hotel .. the traffic  noise from the highway and other guests due to thin walls made sleep difficult.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff very helpful and friendly on check-in. Convenient shuttle to BART. Good breakfast selection.
review.negativeRemarks: Don't think anything can be done to remedy noise.
review.locationRemarks: Very convenient to the airport. Good shuttle service. Diner and take away less than 5 mins walk

managementResponses.response: Hello Melissa and thank you so much for your nice review on your recent stay!  I am glad you liked our breakfast.  I'm a little confused on your comment regarding prices on our menus - there are prices both on our restaurant menu as well as room service menus.  We hope you come back and see us again soon.  Thanks again!  Jim McGuire, General Manager

review.title: Nice hotel ,great breakfast !
review.reviewText:
The hotel was very nice and every morning they had a great breakfast( buffet style ) ready for the guest ! 
The only complaint we had was, it was a drive to  fisherman's wharf.But For a nice hotel ,it was worth the drive. Thank you expedia !
review.positiveRemarks: The nice breakfast that was ready for the guest every morning and how clean the rooms were.
review.negativeRemarks: Hotel restaurant could list the food  prices on their menus, that are in the hotel rooms.
review.locationRemarks: There is a Wingstop restaurant ( near the Safeway ) has excellent wings !

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for your comments!  We appreciate your feedback!  I hope you enjoyed our area!
Jim McGuire, General Manager

review.reviewText: It was perfect. Got up and was in half moon bay in 25 minutes ...

managementResponses.response: Hello Paul and thank you so much for your great comments on your recent stay!  We love our guests from the UK and I am very pleased you had a pleasant stay.  We hope to see you again the next time you visit the States!  Jim McGuire, General Manager

review.title: Clean comfortable airport hotel
review.reviewText:
Free shuttle to and from the airport. Clean comfortable and very welcoming. Front of house and restaurant staff had the usual American welcome that was very good. No attitude just great service. Usual US hotel free internet is a real positive for UK travellers. 
My room was on 6th floor, very clean comfortable and well appointed. Good air conditioning Filter coffee maker in room with powder creamer - not good for English tea. Fridge in room too 
Only negative was the road noise from freeway - Windows only single glazed so bring earplugs if like me you're a light sleeper 

Breakfast simple but plentiful fresh buffet style 
Definitely recommend to overnight or even city tourists as the price was about half of city centre hotel at same standard.

managementResponses.response: Hi Tezzy and thank you for your nice comments on our hotel, and thank you for your continued patronage!  Please try our restaurant for dinner - you will be pleasantly surprised.  We appreciate your feedback!  Jim McGuire, General Manager

review.title: Great  convenient  hotel !
review.reviewText: Located right between the airport and the city on the airport boulevard. One of my favs! Hotel is always nice and clean, the staff doesn't bother me every 2 seconds. No doorman in my business and no bugs in the room! Haven't ate the restaurant since my first time stating their, (food had no flavor). Since then the hotel has been renovated and also the menu has changed so who knows.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your nice review, please come back soon!  Jim McGuire, General Manager

review.reviewText: Got a room last minute here and the stay was as expected. Clean room, nice staff.

managementResponses.response: Thanks so much!  I'm glad you enjoyed our breakfast.  Please come back soon!  Jim McGuire, General Manger

review.title: Close to airport and BART transit.
review.reviewText: Clean spacious room. Nice buffet breakfast. Helpful and friendly staff.
